Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' before transitioning to 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Total duration of 'Accepted + Wait' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' followed by 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Difference in average duration between 'Accepted + Wait' and 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Difference in total duration between 'Accepted + Wait' and 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases leading to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Total duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases not leading to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and the end of case where activity 'Completed + Resolved does not occur

Name: Minimum duration of 'Accepted + Wait' before any subsequent activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Maximum duration of 'Accepted + Wait' before transitioning to 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases with 'Completed + In Call' as the final activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Total duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases with 'Completed + In Call' as the final activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases with more than one occurrence of 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and activity Accepted + In Progress for cases where activity Accepted + In Progress occurs

Name: Duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in the shortest path to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in the longest path to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases that involve 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' before 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'
